channel.title: Auto attack npc
channel.description:
hey i heard u need to use ur client to make a npc auto attack can anyone give me a short tut or tell me how to make my npc autoattack
the npc id is "5" (spirit beast) thanks im using pwnscape 377

item.title: Auto attack npc
item.dc:creator: @powerknite7 powerknite7
item.description:
@powerknite7 wrote:

ok , il explain its not hard

step 1 control+f
look for this

			case 941:

u wil see somthing like this

[code] public boolean npcGetsAnnoyed(int Npc) {
switch(npcs[Npc].npcType) {
case 50:
case 3200:
case 1115:
case 1459:
case 1155:
case 1160:
case 2627:
case 2630:
case 2631:
case 2738:
case 2741:
case 2743:
case 2745:
case 2746:
case 1472:
case 63:
case 111:
case 125:
case 59:
case 91:
case 912:
case 913:
case 914:
case 78:
case 941:
case 5:

[/code]
case here = the id of t he npc so now under the 941 u yust paste the case 5 of the spirit beast so when ur donne it shoud look like this

[code] public boolean npcGetsAnnoyed(int Npc) {
switch(npcs[Npc].npcType) {
case 50:
case 3200:
case 1115:
case 1459:
case 1155:
case 1160:
case 2627:
case 2630:
case 2631:
case 2738:
case 2741:
case 2743:
case 2745:
case 2746:
case 1472:
case 63:
case 111:
case 125:
case 59:
case 91:
case 912:
case 913:
case 914:
case 78:
case 941:
case 5:

[/code]
now ur donne save compile .
if uwanna add new npcs later dont fergot case+npcid .

goodluck

editt:: U DONT NEED TO CHANGE SOMTTHING IN THE CLIENT FILE.

Read full topic
